mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PS_Students_Debts (student_id,suppliers_id, service_id, school_id, reference_no, quantity, purpose,debit_date, amount_debt,price,grade,class, del_yn, insert_date, insert_id, task_id) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{suppliersId}, #{serviceId}, #{schoolId},#{referenceNo},#{quantity}, #{purpose}, #{debitDate},#{amountDebt},#{price},#{grade},#{sClass}, 'N', SYSDATE(), #{insertId}, #{taskId});

INSERT INTO onetouch.PS_Students_Debts_Task (school_id, grade, class, service_id, note, debit_date, del_yn, insert_date, insert_id) VALUES (#{schoolId}, #{grade}, #{sClass}, #{serviceId}, #{note}, #{debitDate}, 'N', SYSDATE(), #{insertId});
